metadata.name: Conhost.exe CommandLine Path Traversal
metadata.comment: detects the usage of path traversal in conhost.exe indicating possible command/argument confusion/hijacking

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('conhost')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/../../')))

output.summary: detects the usage of path traversal in conhost.exe indicating possible command/argument confusion/hijacking
